title: Why beef prices are soaring as grilling season begins
itunes:title: Why beef prices are soaring as grilling season begins
description:
Senate Republicans filibustered a bill to create a commission on the Capitol insurrection. Politico reports on the vote.

ProPublica reports on a study that says U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement may be using a strategy of quietly releasing detained immigrants who challenge it in court to maintain the status quo on prolonged detentions.

As we head into grilling season, the price of beef is going up. Reuters details why.

Ohio is getting attention for its $1 million COVID-vaccine lottery. The Washington Post looks into the impact of offering prizes for those who get vaccinated.
